Interface Operation

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
CalculAirePolygoneOperation, CalculCercleCirconscritOperation, CalculDistanceOperation, CalculIntersectionCercleDroiteOperation, CalculMediatriceOperation, CalculMilieuOperation, CalculPerimetreCercleOperation, ChangeNomOperation, DeplacerPointOperation
public interface Operation extends Serializable
Interface de base a toutes les operations possibles pour un objet GeoAnalytique
